name: David Snopek's Retro Tank Party
description:
Drive a tank and shoot your friends in a Retro Tank Battle!

This is an online multiplayer (2-4 player) game that you can play right in your browser! (It works best in Chrome.)

You can choose to be randomly matched up with other players who are connected at the same time, OR make a private match, and send the match ID to your friends.

NOTE: This is basically "alpha" quality at this point. The game is still under lots of development and isn't quite where I want it yet.
